title_raw: Undergraduate Summer Research Fellow at ICERM
description: The research conducted examined several numerical methods for solving matrix eigenvalue problems, efficient eigensolvers and their variants: Power Iteration, Inverse Iteration, QR Algorithm, concerning techniques as iteration method, inverse iteration, shifted inverse iteration method, Gram-Schmidt process, Householder transformations, and shifted QR decomposition. We discuss the normalization’s necessity and conditional convergence property for Power Iteration Method and compare various eigensolvers’ performance. We computationally experiment on the PageRank Algorithm and its variants. Additionally, this program explored of a variety of interdisciplinary research topics utilizing large-scale linear algebra, model reduction, randomized algorithms, and deep learning. Investigating the theoretical underpinnings of efficient eigensolvers in applied and computational mathematics and working collaboratively to develop open-source software tools.

title_raw: Enterprise Data & Artificial Intelligence Sales Director
description: I managed the Microsoft data platform and hybrid cloud sales business for enterprise customers in the South Central Region for six years.  In this role, I led a team of sales executives and technical pre-sales specialists/architects with over $100M quota.  We worked with customers and partners (ISV's, Global Alliance Partners, and National SI's) to drive on premise, hybrid, and/or cloud solution sales including Big Data (HADOOP), IAAS, PAAS, and cloud based advanced analytics solutions including machine learning, data warehousing services, and cloud based analytics solutions including PowerBI. We leveraged overlay technical sales staff including data scientists.  Our key competitors included Amazon Web Services, IBM Soft Layer, Rackspace, Teradata, SAP, Oracle, Salesforce.com, and many others. *  Our region exceeded quota four out of six years and our team won many large competitive takeout and "Marquee" deals consistently driving ~ 10% year over year revenue growth in the regions SQL Server business.  Our team finished twice in Top 2 of the 12 US regions on annual quota attainment in region rankings.*  We won many different large Azure workload deals, region was #1 US enterprise in FY 16 on Azure usage, and I led the ISV Co-Sell initiative for region finishing as one of two US enterprise sales regions that exceeded the very high win target set by our US leadership team.*  My team drove over 25 HP & Dell Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) Data Warehouse appliance unit wins and the initial marquee customer references which were used by Microsoft scale out and grow global MPP Data Warehouse business.

I ran a rapidly growing territory for the Azure cloud business for Microsoft in the South Central Region.   This included managing a team of sales professionals, cloud solution architects, and data services architects focused on strategic Azure accounts.   We were responsible for new bookings and ensuring customers are successful with their Digital Transformation initiatives.  We worked with customers and partners (ISV's, Global Alliance Partners, and National SI's) to drive Azure solution sales including Big Data (HADOOP), IAAS, PAAS, and cloud based advanced analytics solutions including machine learning, data warehousing services, Cognitive Services, and cloud based business intelligence solutions. Our team leveraged specialized overlay technical sales staff including data scientists.  Our key competitors include Amazon Web Services, IBM, Teradata, SAP, Oracle, Salesforce.com, and many others.  My team exceeded billing and consumption targets for the region while ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction in the cloud services and the Microsoft strategic partnership.  The key results from last sales year were:*  In FY 17 sales year, finished 124% attainment on Azure quota, my team drove ~ 2/3 of regions year over year growth in monthly Azure usage for region, region finished with #1 ranking in United States in the enterprise business for Azure usage*  I led for sales region the ISV Co-Sell initiative finishing ~ 200% of win target accelerating regional success with partners and landing key design wins to help partners accelerate scale in global market* My team won multiple new "Marquee" accounts for Azure working closely with strategic GSI and ISV partners, drove over 300% Azure usage growth in existing strategic accounts, and ensured customer success in Azure
